Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Neilian Way, north of the Holy Order of the Red Rose.
Room.LongDescription: The Paladin's Holy Order of the Red Rose is located to the south of Neilian Drive, but the entrance to the large building is located off of Wakeforest Drive, to the east. The Holy Order provides advanced training to Paladins before they apply to the Lyanden Castle for service. On the north side of the road is the North Oceancrest Ministry of Rumor Control, a sort of media controller for the city.
